#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	//freopen("RGPVR101.in","r",stdin);
	int T = 0; cin >> T;
	while(T--)
	{
		
		string StringCode = ""; cin >> StringCode;
		
		for(int i = StringCode.length()/2-1; i >= 0; i--)
			cout << StringCode[i];
		for(int i = StringCode.length()-1; i >= StringCode.length()/2; i--)
			cout << StringCode[i];
		cout << endl;
	}//end while
	
	return 0;
	
}//end main
